name: The Written Word
overview:
The Written Word believes that the dictionary is one of the best examples of documentation principles put to great use. It is easy to read, refer, and moreover, universal in its appeal.

We strive to create all our clientsâ€™ content requirements as perfectly as any great dictionary does.

The Written Word is a content services and documentation outsourcing company under the aegis of the Open 9 group. An extension of these services is our capability to provide instructional design services to clientâ€™s looking at eLearning as their preferred training medium.

The Written Word has been formed through the association of seasoned technical and creative writers, instructional designers and experienced creative artists. Our objective is to create documentation that communicates effectively with its intended audience. We will create technical documentation that is accurate, informative, readable, user-friendly, and helpful. Additionally, our instructional design team strives to provide learning solutions which really count!
